links.title: The Worst Text You Could Ever Receive...
links.description: This iPhone bug (Mac OS as well) is rendering aspects of the device useless. It seems that when a specific foreign character is rendered in any app it causes a relaunch of the springboard. Afterwards, the effected app can no longer be opened unless some kind of rescue message replaces the offending one.

messages.body: $AAPL Morningstar Reiterates $170.00 Price Target for Apple  https://wishstocks.blogspot.com/2018/02/morningstar-reiterates-17000-price.html

links.title: Morningstar Reiterates $170.00 Price Target for Apple
links.description: Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) has been assigned a $170.00 price objective by equities research analysts at Morningstar in a report released on Friday, February 2nd. The brokerage presently has a "neutral" rating on the iPhone maker's stock. Morningstar's price target would suggest a potential downside of 1.41% from the stock's previous close.

messages.body: S&P 500, Amazon, Microsoft, And Apple Getting Ready For A Fall $spy $amzn $spx $msft $aapl $vix  https://mottcapitalmanagement.com/sp-500-amazon-microsoft-apple-getting-ready-fall/

links.title: S&P 500, Amazon, Microsoft, And Apple Getting Ready For A Fall
links.description: Stocks continued their rebound on Friday but faded towards days end. The S&P 500 was able to get all the way to our trend line at 2,760 but failed. It also reverted below support at 2,742 and as the chart shows was unable to rise above that level despite a few attempts.

links.title: Larry McDonald Says Sell Apple Inc. (AAPL) Amid Bond Portfolio Woes
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) makes more money than any other company on earth, but the market is failing to price in the plunging value of its massive corporate bond portfolio, according to one prominent analyst.
